sentences.en: A significant secular increase has occurred in particulate pollution over the North Atlantic.
sentences.cn: 在北大西洋上粒子的污染明显地逐年增加.

sentences.en: Cardinal Daly has said that churches should not be used for profane or secular purposes.
sentences.cn: 戴利主教已经说过，教堂不应该用于非宗教或世俗的目的。

sentences.en: Do you believe in perpetual love in this secular world?
sentences.cn: 在这个世俗的世界你还相信有天长地久的爱情 吗 ?

sentences.en: He spoke about preserving the country as a secular state.
sentences.cn: 他谈及了保持该国世俗化的问题。

sentences.en: Jealousy and resentment are not strangers to seminaries any more than they are to secular institutions.
sentences.cn: 妒忌、猜疑和怨恨在神学院里也是司空见惯的,并不比世俗的学校少.

sentences.en: Not a secular troubles. I ask you to warm me warm.
sentences.cn: 不在为世俗烦恼、请你温暖我温暖我.

sentences.en: Secular disequilibrium of uranium can lead to erroneous results.
sentences.cn: 铀的永久不平衡会导致错误的结果.
世俗音乐是绝对禁止的.

sentences.en: Secularity ( adjective form secular ) is the state of being separate from religion.
sentences.cn: 世俗或俗世是指脱离宗教的状态.

sentences.en: Some of these secular priests were ignorant, bumptious.
sentences.cn: 那些俗里俗气的神父中有些人一窍不通, 自以为是.

sentences.en: The choir sings both sacred and secular music.
sentences.cn: 唱诗班既唱圣乐也唱世俗歌曲.

sentences.en: The church can only go so far in secular matters.
sentences.cn: 教会在世俗事务上只能做这么多。

sentences.en: The Church has no part in what secular arm may see fit to do.
sentences.cn: 至于世俗的权力采取什么适当措施,这与教会毫不相干.

sentences.en: They established secular education, thereby breaking the educational monopoly of the monasteries.
sentences.cn: 他们建立了世俗教育, 从而打破了教育的垄断地位寺庙.

sentences.en: This is the tone of the eighteenth century in New England, relaxed and secular.
sentences.cn: 这便是十八世纪新英格兰作品的语调, 轻松而不避尘俗.

words.tran_cn: 世俗主义；现世主义；宗教与教育分离论
世俗论者；宗教宗教与教育分离论者
世俗化；还俗；把教育与宗教分离
世俗的；长期的；现世的；不朽的

trans.tran_cn: 现世的，俗界的，长期的，长久的，不朽的，一世纪一次的
trans.tran_en: not connected with or controlled by a church or other religious authority

trans.tran_cn: 修道院外的教士，(对宗教家而言的) 俗人
